links.title: What is Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) Math Transform Indicator? Macroaxis
links.description: Apple math transform tool provides the execution environment for running the Square Root Of Price Series transformation and other technical functions against Apple. Apple value trend is the prevailing direction of the price over some defined period of time. The concept of trend is an important idea in technical analysis, including the analysis of math transform indicators.

body: @szaero I remember $AAPL PE was 6 and still I couldn’t make money on calls. Narrative will change when markets crash. Off course $AAPL is more legit valuations compared to junk like $UPST $SHOP $MRNA etc but still this high PE ratio is not sustainable. Every stock will follow $ARKK just matter of time.

The Piotroski-F score of $AAPL is 7.00. This indicates good health for $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/quote/AAPL/fundamental-analysis?key=bb853040-a4ac-41c6-b549-d218d2f21b32&utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=FA&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

$AAPL You sexy thing you. I know you’ll make me
Money by end of year.

@chitownbull23 Tesla is not a car company. This is wrong to think so narrowly. This is the same mistake people made for $AAPL. Apple does not make computers, it does much more. At the end of the day, it is about paradigm shift. A company that brings that goes big. Apple did it with the iPhone… Tesla is going with cars, robotaxis… 
 
After 20 years, you have not understood why companies explode and set new highs? You were there when Apple did. You should see the same ferments for $TSLA but on a bigger scale now. Tesla is changing transportation, energy and so many other fields. The stock is not done reflecting the commercial power of TESLA.
$AAPL time to make some money

$SPY Interesting week ahead.. leaning bullish. So many stocks beat down and oversold. $AAPL $TSLA $MSFT earnings maybe the catalysts to drive the market up in the short term. Intense selloff Friday should be followed up with a bounce, 445-450 at least imo. And further down from there..

links.title: Elliott Wave View: Apple (AAPL) Can See Further Downside
links.description: Short Term Elliott Wave View in AAPL suggests the decline from January 04th peak is unfolding as a zig zag Elliott Wave structure. Down from January 04th high, wave ((i)) ended at 174.46. Wave ((ii)) bounce was a strong movement pullback completed at 179.80. Then the stock continued dropping to complete wave ((iii)) at 172.10.

links.title: Apple PE Ratio 2006-2021 | AAPL
links.description: Current and historical p/e ratio for Apple (AAPL) from 2006 to 2021. The price to earnings ratio is calculated by taking the latest closing price and dividing it by the most recent earnings per share (EPS) number. The PE ratio is a simple way to assess whether a stock is over or under valued and is the most widely used valuation measure.
